archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ACC001 User error (accidental)
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
Accidental errors made by an authorised user (internal or external) when using or maintaining information systems.
Assessment guidance: Note: This threat event is not as a result of negligence or carelessness.
At lower levels of threat strength (i.e. individuals with limited or no access privileges), errors will generally result in greatly reduced or minimal impact to information systems.
At higher levels of threat strength (i.e. individuals that have been assigned privileged access such as administrators), errors have the ability to cause greater impact to information systems.
